description.value: As a transmuter, you alter the physical properties of things, transforming creatures, objects, the natural world, and even yourself at your whim. You understand that change is inevitable. You add one 1st-level transmutation spell (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Magic Weapon]{Magic Weapon}) to your spellbook. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Physical Boost]{Physical Boost} school spell.
